description.displayText: Mardi worked for me for 15 years, helped in raising my 4 children. She was dependable, honest, loving and my now adult kids still care about her a lot. She is particularly wonderful with babies and toddlers. During the time she worked for us, she did just about everything that can be done with kids, all of the usual things but also including taking them to the dr, staying with them while we were away on vacation, traveling with us, driving them around, etc. I highly recommend Mardi and think anyone who hires her will be very fortunate.
